column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: An unidentified foreign man was found dead on the sidewalk on Monivong Boulevard
column5: Daun Penh district at 12:50 am on 10 May 2020.------UPDATE: The man was later identified as Felix Leo Steinmann
column7: a Swiss national------.------ Authorities concluded that he died of a heart attack.------Authorities said the man was white and aged in his 40â€™s.------He was found in front of house 108-110 on Monivong.------Police arrived and inspected the scene
column8: and the body was taken to Wat Teuk Thla. No cause of death was given in reports.
